name: Compulsion (andreborja, Naomi Freire, AccidentalMallu, abhyuSardesai)
description:
Slenderman inspired horror game in a classic Game Boy style

Explore a dark forest with only a flashlight and a camera. Find cryptic letters to unravel the mystery surrounding this weird place. But beware! For you are not alone.... a dark presence lurks in the shadows, and is out to get you. Your only defense is running, so stay alert while you roam the woods trying to find a way out.

Controls 

Staying faithful to the original system, Compulsion uses the same amount of inputs.

Use WASD to move around.

Use ENTER to interact with objects.

Tapping R SHIFT activates the camera flash to illuminate the screen briefly. But you need batteries for that!

You can access a menu with ESC, where you navigate with WASD, select with ENTER, and close the menu with ENTER.

Team (Curry&Beans):

Game Programmer: Abhyudaya Sardesai - https://itch.io/profile/abhyusardesai / https://www.linkedin.com/in/abhyudaya-sardesai/

2D Artist / Programmer / Sound Designer: Andre Borja Miranda - https://andreborja.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreborja/

Project Manager / 2D Artist / Level & Narrative Designer: Naomi Nagayama Freire - https://naomifreire.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/naomi-freire-068520189/

Character Designer / 2D Artist: Nicholas John - https://accidentalmallu.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/nicholas-john-524108173/
